price: koji govori, kad mu se ajeti Naši kazuju: “To su samo naroda drevnih priče!”
arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idhā tut'lā ʿalayhi āyātunā qāla asāṭīru al-awalīna
